long_description: Perfect for camping, cruises or trips, Coghlan's Personal Care Kit is carry-on approved for flying and includes essentials such as bathroom tissue, soap, a camp towel and a mirror. Camp towel/washcloth is lightweight and compact; it absorbs 10 times its weight in water and dries quickly, making it ready for reuse. 2-ply bathroom tissue comes with a convenient dispenser. Biodegradable camp soap is good for over 50 washings. Virtually unbreakable acrylic mirror is ideal for camping and travel. Razor cover helps keep your razor blade clean and protected. Toothbrush holder keeps your toothbrush clean, dry and handy. Toilet seat covers are sanitary and convenient for hotels, rest stops and airports; 10 seat covers included. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for camping, cruises or trips, Coghlan's Personal Care Kit is carry-on approved for flying and includes essentials such as bathroom tissue, soap, a camp towel and a mirror.
